attributes.action: Bring back the proper Identity of Britain!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain may be a cosmopolitan country but I feel that along with that we have lost what it is to be British!  If people choose to live in our country they should obide by our rules and regulations.  I cannot see any other country that bends over backwards for other religions and changes their main beliefs to accomodate others.  We are a country that is losing our identity and it's damaging to us.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
